dict.acceptation: 当前，目前；通常，一般，现在；容易，流畅；普遍地；

sent.orig: She is a former assitant assistant Treasury secretary currently currently at the management consulting company McKinsey.
sent.trans: 她是前财政助理部长，当前就任于麦肯锡管理咨询公司。

sent.orig: Application Engineer, currently base in Intel APAC R&D Center in Shanghai, China.
sent.trans: 应用工程师，目前在位于中国上海的英特尔亚太研发中心工作。

sent.orig: Currently, PALIC has 32 products offer, among which 8 were launched in 2003, approval.
sent.trans: 太平洋安泰人寿现共有产品32个，其中2003年新开发并被批准上市的产品有8个。

sent.orig: City-economy of our country is still at capital-driving phase currently.
sent.trans: 当前我国城市经济仍处于资本推动阶段。

sent.orig: I'm currently writing a diploma thesis about the Wikipedia project and its editions in different languages.
sent.trans: 我正在写一篇关于维基百科计划及其不同语言版本的学位论文。
